channel.title: Waterfall on Ajka+Andrej
channel.description: Recent content in Waterfall on Ajka+Andrej

item.title: Easter trip
item.description: Last Friday we went to Easter trip. We had a beautiful warm weather, around 25 degrees and I saw a newspaper tip for a nice trip to a waterfall. I thought that in this lovely April weather everything is melting and so there could be a lot of water. After a small survey, I found two other even bigger waterfalls near the original one. From parking places it was up to 20 minutes walk to each one and so we decided to see all of them.
